button.pass: Open the shop for this round, costs 1 Shop Pass
button.coupon: Get a %off%% OFF on the next bough item! Costs 1 Shop Coupon
button.reroll: Reroll all the items in the shop
button.rest:
Rest for a bit and recover %val1%% max health, %val2%% max mana and stamina and %val3%% max sanity for the price of %gold% gold
This service is not granted when using the shop pass

text.leavetext:
Are you sure you want to leave? 
You will lose all your progress on this battle.
text.confirmdeletetext: You will lose all your progress on this journey.

showdetail.cantuse: Doesn't allow the user to use:
showdetail.chancetostop: The user have %chance%% to %optional%stop the attack.

desc.hpregen: Amount of health regenerated per turn.
desc.manaregen: Amount of mana regenerated per turn.
desc.stamina: If the stamina is low, the user gets tired.
desc.staminaregen: Amount of stamina regenerated per turn.
desc.sanity: If sanity reaches 0, the user is feared.
desc.def: Use 18% of this stat and subtracts to the physical damage that the user takes.
desc.magicdef: Use 12% of this stat and subtracts to the magical damage that the user takes.
desc.critdmg: The damage that the user deals is multiplied by this stat if its a critical hit. Usualy only physical damage can crit.
desc.movspeed: This stat decides who attacks first.
desc.lifesteal: The user converts this stat amount of the physical damage dealt into health.
desc.evasion: Let the user dodge the attacks. (3.5% of the movement speed + 50% of the timing + 1% of the cur sanity)
desc.accuracy: This stat let the user hit or miss its attacking moves.
desc.armourpen: This stat ignores defences of the target when attacking
desc.ultimate: Allows the user to unleash a powerful move.

cancelmsg.plz: %p% cannot move due to the paralize.

desc.brn: When applied another Burn on top, transform into Scorched
desc.sch: The time of the effect is increased when Burn is applied
desc.bld: After 10 turns of bleeding, the user takes <color=#ffaa00>%scale% physical damage</color>

desc.bloodbath: If an enemy is with Blood, the user will gain%mod%and deal bonus %scale% on attacks.
desc.bullsrage: When the user takes <color=#f75145>%maxStacks% critical hits</color> gain%mod%and deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> for 3 turns, or permanantly while below <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color>
desc.courage: The user gain %scale% every %cd% turns and Fear have less %num% turns. When the user is Feared recover %scale2%
desc.dreadofthesupernatural: The user take bonus <color=#b829ff>+%num%% sanity damage</color> from enemy moves. (minimum bonus is %maxNum%)
desc.ecolocation: The user is immune to Blind.
desc.fearsmell: If an enemy is below <color=#b641f0>%num%% sanity</color>, the user gain%mod%If an enemy is with <color=#b641f0>Fear</color>, the user gain%mod2% for %cd% turns
desc.galeglide: Gives the user <color=#227da1>%mod%+ (%maxNum% * %num%% of the user's timing)</color> for the next attack (8 turns cooldown)
desc.lastbreath: When the user is below <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color> gain%mod%
desc.magicremains: The user recovers %scale% when uses a <color=#1a66ff>magical</color> or <color=#CC66FF>enchantment</color> move (%cd% turns cooldown).
desc.manathirst: When the user is below <color=#1e68fc>%num%% mana</color> will recover %scale% and will get%mod%(%cd% turns cooldown)
desc.musicup: Every %cd% turns, the user get%mod%(stacks up to %maxStacks%).
desc.onewiththeshadows: If the user is not hit %cd% times gain%mod%until is hit again.
desc.perfectshooter: Every <color=#f75145>%maxNum% critical ranged attacks</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color>, the user gain%mod%(stacks up to %maxStacks%).
desc.plasmablade: The user's <color=#ffaa00>physical</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> deal bonus %scale%. If the user is below <color=#00ff11>%stacks%% health</color>, the bonus <color=#1a66ff>magic damage</color> is increased by %num%%, deal bonus %scale2% and gain%mod%(If the user is silenced or bellow <color=#1e68fc>%maxNum%% mana</color>, the passive won't activate)
desc.roughskin: The user blocks <color=#ffaa00>(<color=#937264>%num%%</color> of the user's <color=#937264>damage resistance</color>)% of the physical damage</color> taken from <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> and <color=#f75145>ranged moves</color>.
desc.sharpshooter: Every <color=#f75145>%maxNum% ranged attacks</color>, the next <color=#f75145>ranged attack</color> will <color=#f75145>crit</color> and deal bonus %scale%.
desc.strongmind: The user is immune to Confusion, Charm and Sleep.
desc.vendetta: If the user is fighting an enemy with <color=#00ff11>+%num%% max health</color> than the <color=#00ff11>user's max health</color>, deals bonus %scale%, heal %scale2% and have%mod%on that enemy with <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> (%cd% turns cooldown)
desc.weakbody: If the user is with Blood, Allergy, Poison or Tired lose%mod%
desc.wildinstinct: When the user is below <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color>, will get%mod%per <color=#00ff11>1% of missing health</color>
desc.phantomhand: The user deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> for %cd% turns.
desc.bloodpumping: The user regen %scale% every turn for %cd% turns, but if its with Blood loses the same amount of health.
desc.huntingseason: The user deal bonus <color=#f75145>%num%% damage</color> for %cd% turns.
desc.blazingfists: The user deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> for %cd% turns.
desc.fighterinstinct: When the user is below <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color>, gain%mod%and deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> and <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color>.
desc.successoroffire: The user deal bonus %scale% to Burn or Schorched enemies with <color=#ffaa00>basic</color>, <color=#ffaa00>physical</color>, <color=#1a66ff>magical</color> and <color=#f75145>ranged moves</color>, also gain bonus <color=#ffaa00>+(<color=#1a66ff>%num%% magic power</color>) attack damage</color>.
desc.zenmode: The user is immune to Tired, but when is bellow <color=#f0dd0a>%num%% stamina</color>, gain%mod%and regen %scale% and %scale2% until the user is at %maxNum%% stamina.
desc.baby: But its just a baby! (Some of your stats were lowered by %num%%)
desc.weak: The enemy is too weak. (Some of your stats were lowered by %num%%)
desc.normal: Avarage normal enemy, nothing special. (Some of your stats were lowered by %num%%)
desc.strong: Did he ate spinaches or something? (Some of your stats were lowered by %num%%)
desc.superstrong: Finally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!
desc.legendary: This is a tough oponent, you are filled with determination. (Some of your stats were increased by %num%%)
desc.boss: That is a big boi. (Some of the user's stats were increased by %num%%)
desc.toxicteeth: The user deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> for %cd% turns.
desc.gravitybelt: When the carrier uses a <color=#ffaa00>physical move</color> or <color=#ffaa00>basic attack</color> and <color=#f75145>crits</color>, deal bonus %scale% and gain%mod%
desc.manasword:
Every <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> the carrier gain%mod%up to %maxStacks% times.
When at maximum stacks the user gain%mod2%and deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color>.
desc.manascepter:
Every <color=#1a66ff>magic</color>, <color=#CC66FF>enchantment</color> or <color=#787878>defencive</color> move the carrier gain%mod%up to %maxStacks% times.
When at maximum stacks the user gain%mod2%and deal bonus %scale% on <color=#1a66ff>magic</color> and <color=#CC66FF>enchantment</color> moves.
desc.shadowdagger: The user's <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> deal bonus %scale% and gain%mod%. (%cd% turns cooldown)
desc.spectralring:
The user gain%mod%every %cd% turns up to %maxStacks% times.
When the user drops below <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color>, <color=#1a66ff>magic moves</color> deal bonus %scale%.
desc.huntersdirk: If the target is above <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color>, <color=#ffaa00>basic</color> or <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> deal bonus %scale%. (%cd% turns cooldown)
desc.gravitychange: The user deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> for %cd% turns
desc.prismaticstaff: Every %maxStacks% magic moves, the next will <color=#f75145>crit</color> (also applies to the <color=#1a66ff>magic damage</color>) and deal bonus %scale%
desc.mechashield: The user gain%mod%and converts %num%% of the <color=#ffaa00>physical damage</color> dealt into <color=#1a66ff>magic damage</color> while <color=#787878>shielded</color>, when runs out of <color=#787878>shield</color> take %scale2%. Also gain%mod2%and %scale% at the cost of %stacks% ultimate energy every turn.
desc.combatrepair: The user gain%mod%per <color=#B266FF>summon</color> alive (stack up to %maxStacks% times). When the user gains a <color=#787878>shield</color> that is not earned from the user's ultimate move, gain that <color=#787878>shield</color> over %num% turns.
desc.magicwand: The user's <color=#1a66ff>magical</color> and <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> deal bonus %scale%
desc.crossbow: The user's <color=#f75145>ranged</color> and <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color> deal bonus %scale%
desc.funchase: The user will gain bonus%mod%and deals bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>basic</color> or <color=#ffaa00>physical moves</color> if an enemy is Bleeding
desc.bandofendurance: The user recover %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical</color> and <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color>, this effect is increased by %num%% on <color=#f75145>critical hits</color>
desc.mythicearrings: The user recover %scale% on <color=#1a66ff>magical</color> and <color=#ffaa00>basic attacks</color>
desc.spectralpike:
The carrier's <color=#ffaa00>physical</color> or <color=#f75145>ranged</color> moves, have %num%% (doubles if bellow <color=#00ff11>%maxNum%% health</color>) chance to deal bonus <color=#ffaa00>%maxStacks%% physical damage</color> once (%cd% turns cooldown regardless activates or not)
When the carrier is bellow <color=#00ff11>%maxNum%% health</color> gain%mod%
desc.spectralcloak:
The carrier gain %scale% per <color=#946ACD>%maxNum% magic resistance</color> when take <color=#1a66ff>magic damage</color>
Also when bellow <color=#00ff11>%num%% health</color>, gain%mod%
desc.thickarmour: The user take <color=#ffaa00>%num%% physical damage</color> on <color=#f75145>critical strikes</color>
desc.combatrythm: The user deal bonus %scale% on <color=#ffaa00>physical</color> and <color=#1a66ff>magical moves</color>
desc.sackofbones: The user immune to Bleeding but Cripple have its duration increased by %num% turns and take bonus %scale% when applied

move.zap: The carrier will <color=#ffdf00>zap</color> the target with a %type% to %dmg%
move.huntersdirk: use a %type% that %dmg%and have <color=#f75145>%critdmg%% critical damage bonus</color>
move.shadowshroom: The carrier uses an %type% that %dmg%and grants %modu%
move.prismaticstaff: use a %type% that %dmg%and have <color=#f75145>%critdmg%% critical damage bonus</color>

purchase.shoppass: The user can open the shop when its closed
purchase.shopcoupon: The user gain a coupon that can be used on teh shop to get a 20% Off on an item

summon.title: Summon
summon.desc: summons a %summonname%, that will %summonaction% every %summonactioncd% turns
